title: Shut Down or Continue to Operate

content.question: A profit-maximizing firm is currently producing a quantity at which price is less than average variable cost. To maximize profit, the firm will do which of the following in the short run and the long run?

choices.label: Shut down in the short run and exit the market in the long run.
Produce less quantity in the short run and increase its scale of production in the long run.
Produce more quantity in the short run and increase its scale of production in the long run.
Continue producing the same quantity in the short run and in the long run.
Continue producing the same quantity in the short and exit the market in the long run.

content.answer: Shut down in the short run and exit the market in the long run.
